column1: Given the administration's poor record with disinformation (i.e., lies), the fact that anyone other than recognized health experts—especially Anthony Fauci, Debbie Birx or even Alex Azar (he's a lawyer, but leads HHS)—says anything about #COVID19 is bad. Mulvaney's lied before.

"...tests have confirmed the presence of a novel coronavirus--one of a family of viruses which have proved particularly deadly over the last 20 years, infecting more than 10,000 people & killing around 1,600."

In other words, DON'T FORGET about flu, measles, etc.

#VaccinesWork.https://twitter.com/MackayIM/status/1218537213320810496 …
